complaint.title: Complaint
complaint.info: The complaint limit refers to open and rejected complaints. If your complaint is accepted it will not count towards your total number of complaints.
complaint.description: You can submit up to {{ maxComplaintNumber }} complaints in total in this course.
complaint.descriptionExtended: Every student is allowed to submit up to {{ maxComplaintNumber }} complaints in total in this course. You still have {{ allowedComplaints }} complaints left.
complaint.descriptionTeam: You can submit up to {{ maxComplaintNumber }} complaints as a team for this whole course.
complaint.descriptionTeamExtended: Every team is allowed to submit up to {{ maxComplaintNumber }} complaints in total in this course. Your team still has {{ allowedComplaints }} complaints left.
complaint.beDescriptive: Please describe in detail why the assessment is wrong. Your request will then be evaluated by a second reviewer.
complaint.beDescriptiveTeam: Please describe in detail why the assessment is wrong. Your submission will then be re-evaluated by your tutor.
complaint.alreadySubmitted: You have already submitted a complaint
complaint.complaintNotAllowedTooltip: Currently not allowed: complaint limit reached or assessment is older than one week
complaint.hint: Scroll down to review the complaint
complaint.tooManyComplaints: Complaint limit reached. You cannot have more than {{ maxComplaintNumber }} open or rejected complaints at the same time.

listOfComplaints.title: List of complaints
listOfComplaints.noComplaintsToShow: There are no complaints to show at the moment

moreFeedback.title: More Feedback Request
moreFeedback.description: If something is not clear enough, or you need more explanations, you can request the tutor to provide more feedback
moreFeedback.descriptionTeam: If something is not clear enough, or you need more explanations, you can request your tutor to provide more feedback
moreFeedback.beDescriptive: Please describe in detail what is unclear for you in the assessment. Your request will then be evaluated by the same reviewer.
moreFeedback.beDescriptiveTeam: Please describe in detail what is unclear for you in the assessment. Your tutor will then clarify their assessment.
moreFeedback.created: Your More Feedback Request has been submitted!
moreFeedback.info: Submitting feedback request will not affect number of maximum complaints, but your score will remain unchanged.
moreFeedback.alreadySubmitted: You have already requested more feedback
moreFeedback.notAllowedTooltip: Currently not allowed: assessment is older than one week

list.title: List of More Feedback Requests
list.noRequestsToShow: There are no requests to show at the moment

moreFeedback.hint: Scroll down to review More Feedback Request
